## Card.getDimensions() method

Get the dimensions of a card class, as specified by `width` / `height` / `thickness` decorators.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getDimensions(CardType: {
        new (...args: any[]): Card;
    }): ICardDimensions;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CardType | { new (...args: any\[\]): [Card](./bge-core.card.md)<!-- -->; } | Type of card to get the dimensions of. |

**Returns:**

[ICardDimensions](./bge-core.icarddimensions.md)

Width, height, and thickness of the card in centimeters.
